name: Historic bitter crab syndrome monitoring dataset
description: This dataset contains sample collection data for all majid, cancrid and lithodid decapods collected by the NOAA AFSC Pathobiology group from 1978 to 2013

spatialCoverage.name: LME's: Bering Sea, GOA, Arctic, Beaufort Sea, Aleutian Islands, Atlantic Coast/Newfoundland

variableMeasured.name: SPNO
variableMeasured.description: Unique specimen ID. First four numbers correspond to year of collection

variableMeasured.name: Species_Name
variableMeasured.description: Decapod species sampled

variableMeasured.name: Sex
variableMeasured.description: 0=NA, 1=Male, 2=Female, 3=Unknown, 4=Hermaphrodite, 5=Transitional, 6=indeterminant

variableMeasured.name: Size
variableMeasured.description: Carapace length (lithodid) or carapace width (Chioneocetes)

variableMeasured.name: Chela
variableMeasured.description: Height at widest point of right chela: males only

variableMeasured.name: Shell_Condition
variableMeasured.description: 0=premolt/molting, 1=softshell, 2=newshell, 3=oldshell, 4=very oldshell, 5=graveyard, 9=unk

variableMeasured.name: Clutch
variableMeasured.description: Female egg color, egg condition and clutch size information. See "Clutch_Codes.csv" for numeric codes

variableMeasured.name: Collection_Comments
variableMeasured.description: General comments about specimen/nature of collection

variableMeasured.name: BODYID
variableMeasured.description: Body location of visual anomaly. See "Histology_Codes.csv" for numeric codes

variableMeasured.name: VISUAL
variableMeasured.description: Visual anamoly. See "Histology_Codes.csv" for numeric codes

variableMeasured.name: DISTID
variableMeasured.description: Distibution of physical anomaly. See "Histology_Codes.csv" for numeric codes

variableMeasured.name: Year
variableMeasured.description: Year of specimen collection

variableMeasured.name: Date
variableMeasured.description: Date of specimen collection

variableMeasured.name: HISTO_result
variableMeasured.description: Etiology results for organ/tissue/cell examined: See "Histology_Codes.csv" for numeric codes

variableMeasured.name: SMEAR_result
variableMeasured.description: Results from visual inspection of hemolymph smear preparations stained with Geimsa and read with a compound microscope for BCS diagnosis. Numeric results of 0 = BCS negative, 1 = BCS positive, 3=Undetermined, 4=Unreadable slide, 8=slide missing, 7777=no result-smear was made, 9999=no smear made for sample

variableMeasured.name: T_Rating
variableMeasured.description: T_Rating field has more detail about the cells on the slide for BCS positive samples including Hematodinium stage (T = trophont, P = prespore, D = dinospore) and relative amount of that cell type ranging from 1-5 (1 = up to 10% of cells viewed and 5 = over 90% of cells viewed). T_Rating is not available for samples collected prior to 1999

variableMeasured.name: BCS_PCR_results
variableMeasured.description: PCR Assay results for BCS diagnosis. Numeric results of 0=BCS negative, 1=BCS positive, 3=inconclusive (ie disagreement at loci, extra band), 4=results pending, 7777=No result-DNA preserved, 9999=No DNA preserved for this sample

variableMeasured.name: Specific_Location
variableMeasured.description: Specific location of sample collection within LME. See "Location_Codes.csv" for numeric codes

variableMeasured.name: General_Location
variableMeasured.description: General location of sample collection corresponding with LME. See "Location_Codes.csv" for numeric codes

variableMeasured.name: C_V_H
variableMeasured.description: The concatenation of the Cruise, Vessel and Haul for the collection location. For some records that do not have a cruise/vessel/haul, a combination of 0_0_SPNO is used instead to ensure a unique value is used for location data

variableMeasured.name: Cruise
variableMeasured.description: Cruise ID for Bering Sea/GOA/Atlantic bottom trawl surveys. See RACEBASE or AKFIN for additional NOAA cruise metadata

variableMeasured.name: Vessel
variableMeasured.description: ID number of the vessel used to collect data for that haul associated with vessel name. See "Vessel_Codes.csv" for numeric codes

variableMeasured.name: Haul
variableMeasured.description: Uniquely identifies a sampling event (haul) within an AFSC cruise. It is a sequential number, in chronological order of occurrence.

variableMeasured.name: StationID
variableMeasured.description: Alpha-numeric designation for the station established in the design of AFSC standardized surveys.

variableMeasured.name: Stratum
variableMeasured.description: RACE database statistical area for analyzing data. Strata were designed using bathymetry and other geographic and habitat-related elements. See AKFIN for a complete list of stratum descriptions

variableMeasured.name: LME
variableMeasured.description: Large marine ecosystem of collection: 1=Bering Sea/Slope, 2=GOA/SEAK, 54=NE Arctic/Chukchi Sea, 55=Beaufort Sea, 65=Aleutian Islands, 80=Atlantic Coast/Newfoundland

variableMeasured.name: Haul_Date
variableMeasured.description: The date (MM/DD/YYYY) and time (HH:MM) of the beginning of the haul.

variableMeasured.name: Latitude
variableMeasured.description: Latitude of specimen collection. Designates latitude at start of haul for AFSC standardized surveys

variableMeasured.name: Longitude
variableMeasured.description: Longitude of specimen collection. Designates longititude at start of haul for AFSC standardized surveys

variableMeasured.name: Depth
variableMeasured.description: Bottom depth

variableMeasured.name: Bottom_Type
variableMeasured.description: Substrate type recorded during survey: See AFSC Groundfish Survey Codes Bottom Type Code Supplementary Table (Pg 40)

variableMeasured.name: Bottom_Temp
variableMeasured.description: Bottom temperature (tenths of a degree Celsius); NA indicates removed or missing values.

variableMeasured.name: Surface_Temp
variableMeasured.description: Surface temperature (tenths of a degree Celsius); NA indicates removed or missing values.

distribution.name: Historic bitter crab syndrome monitoring data
